ResponseRules.description: Sam's a little friendly, good-natured. Gets picked on by Elazar a lot. Likable.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: OnUse, Guard Duty
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Approach, Guard Duty
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Player Futz With Door
ResponseRule.description: The door seals off Cargo Bay from the alien swarm outside, and Morgan has just started tampering with the lock that keeps it closed.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: OnUse, All Aliens Dead
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Loiter, All Aliens Dead
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: OnUse, Ready to Attack
ResponseRule.description: Security is bracing for an imminent battle with alien forces. They have been holed up in a safe place, but the time has come to fight the aliens

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Mourn Sarah
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Mourn Dwayne
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Mourn Kevin
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Mourn Alfred

ResponseRule.name: Sam Hertz: Mourn Tamiko
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.
